Key: <<No event data for today!>>
Hi, Itsuka!
Oh... Tonomachi.

So... If you're free today, why don't we go find
something to do?
O-Oh... Uh...

(It's important that I take the Spirits out on
dates... I can't just hang out with Tonomachi.)
Sorry, I have plans.

What the hell? What kind of business do you have
where you'd unceremoniously reject your partner
like this? We're 2nd place for best couple!

You idiot...! Don't say that, or people will get
the wrong idea!

You never hang out with me anymore. Just because
you're Mr. Popular now...
S-Sorry... Later!
Hey, Itsuka!
Oh... Tonomachi, are you on your way home?

Yeah. You see, I was thinking of going to check
out the Neo Tengu Tower.
Neo Tengu Tower? I thought it hadn't opened yet.

You idiot. Researching date spots after they're
open puts you way behind the curve!
Oh...

I mean, it's the #1 spot to go on a date with a
boyfriend, if you believe the conversations
of the girls I've been eavesdropping on.
Okay...

That said, I'm busy today,
so I don't have time for you.

You don't have time for me, huh... I don't recall
asking you for your time.

I just wanted to say it, okay!
God, leave me alone!
Oh, okay... Sorry.
I hate you, Itsuka!
...Itsuka!
Oh, God... Tonomachi!
Hehehe... What are you afraid of?
N-Nothing... I'm not afraid...

You're gonna try to sneak out today too, huh...
I KNOW! You're going on a date, aren't you?!
It's another date today, ISN'T IT?!
Well... that's not the case...
(Well actually, it is...)

It's not fair that you get all the attention!
I'm tagging along today!
What... W-Wait!
No! I'm going, and I'm going to participate!

Participate... This isn't a group date. There's
only one other person coming.
*Grunt*...

And think about it. You're going to be staring
at me hanging out with a girlfriend, while you
sit there alone... Won't that make you feel worse?

(Well not actually a girlfriend, but... Well, he
doesn't have to know that.)
D-Damn it... Itsuka... I hate you!
Phew... I was able to drive him away.
Huh... Tonomachi?
Oh... Itsuka, it's you.
What's the matter...? You seem to be down today...
You see, I figured things out.
What... did you figure out?

Nowadays, it's anyone's guess what's going to
happen, right? I mean, if a big spacequake shook
us up tomorrow, we'd all die, hand-in-hand.
Wh-What are you getting at?

No matter how hard I work to get a girlfriend...
No matter how happy I make her—and I will!
If we die, it'll all be over.
Uh, Tonomachi? What's gotten into you?

Hey, Itsuka. Even if you have a girlfriend,
you can't take them to the other side.
U-Uh...
So... SO! Can't you spare me just one?!
...WHAT?!
I DON'T WANT TO DIE ALONE! Itsuka! Share with me!
Typical Tonomachi... You're horrible...
...Itsuka!
WHOA! Don't scare me, Tonomachi.
Itsuka... I realized something.
...What did you realize?
This world... is just a cruel phantom.
Huh? Wh-What are you talking about?

...Think about it. This world, everything is
unfolding so that you would have a good life...
Don't you think so?
What?

All the cute girls are flocking around you, and
all I can do is stand back and watch in awe.

Basically... This world is a gal game where you're
the protagonist!

Wh-What are you talking about?! Jeez, everything
you say is ridiculous!

GIVE IT TO ME! GIVE ME ONE GIRLFRIEND! Give me!
Or else you'd better date me!

L-Let go of me! And your last statement
makes no sense!
Ah! Wait, Itsuka! ITSUKA!
